DOC.detailed_description: The patient comprehensive eye examination express interest study . This include slit lamp examination front eye dilate fundoscopic examination back eye . If pathology note would exclude patient study , investigator inform patient make appropriate referral . patient deem appropriate study comprehensive examination include computerized videokeratography , enrol . The patient undergo bilateral simultaneous eye surgery . Which eye treat CustomVue eye treat Wavelight randomize 50 % chance either eye receive one treatment . The patient see day surgery , post op day one , one month , three month , six month one year . The patient receive topical antibiotic eye one week follow procedure . The patient receive pred forte 1 % ophthalmic drop one week treatment . The patient also receive vigamox ophthalmic drop four day treatment . All within usual customary standard care treatment patient undergo LASIK surgery .
